text: Gooball is a 2005 arcade-style puzzle video game developed by Over the Edge Entertainment (now Unity Technologies) and published by Ambrosia Software it was released for the Mac OS X. it was the first game made with Unity It was downloaded but it was commercially unsuccessful Unity would not be public if this game was successful. Over the Edge starting to make focus more on making video games == Gameplay == The game starts with the alien in a goo ball which is called "Goober", the gameplay is like Super Monkey Ball. Goober is stuck inside a bubble made out of protoplasm. Goober can stick through walls by holding the command key. Gooball can also tilt and turn. == References== == Other websites == *Official website *2005 archive *2012 archive Category:2005 video games Category:MacOS games Category:MacOS-only games Category:Ambrosia Software games Category:Action video games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Platform game stubs Category:Single-player video games
title: GooBall
